title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and push models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models (chat, embeddings, tool-calling).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (chat history, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and streaming.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit integration to build shareable LLM apps backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack component letting you use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/generate inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single repo.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats with any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer and LiveView examples.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive TUI chat client written in Go using bubbletea.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull via Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, models, and integrations around Ollama.
